outline:
1. to be humble, be humbled, be subdued, be brought down, be low, be under, be brought into subjection
    1. (Niphal)
      1. to humble oneself
      2. to be humbled, be subdued
    2. (Hiphil)
      1. to humble
      2. to subdue
kjv_def: bring down (low), into subjection, under, humble (self), subdue.
strongs_def: properly, to bend the knee; hence, to humiliate, vanquish
